title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d option to correctly compile classes from subpackage
OB: Instead, a new directory named "subpackage" is created under the existing "subpackage" directory
EB: After compiling, only the class file should be created under the existing "subpackage" directory
SR: Create a class in a subpackage, compile it using the ajc command with the -d option, and observe that only the class file is created under the subpackage directory without creating a new subpackage directory.
